snippet: Much chatter, and some complaints, among the military and veterans about a new film featuring active-duty Seals, "Act of Valor."
abstract: Much chatter, and some complaints, among the military and veterans about a new film featuring active-duty Seals, "Act of Valor."
lead_paragraph: The film "Act of Valor" in which active-duty members of the Navy Seals more or less play themselves, had its New York City premiere on Thursday and is scheduled to open in nearly 3,000 theaters nationwide on Feb. 24. Rarely has a movie created as much buzz in the military community.

headline.main: In 'Act of Valor,' a Secret Military World, Approved for Public Viewing
